children.text: {{upload_file_picker.files.length > 0 ? "* File to be uploaded: \n" : ""}}{{upload_file_picker.files.map(function(val, index){ return (index+1)+'. ' +val.name}).join(", \n")}}

children.onClick: {{u_switch_bank_merchant.isSwitchedOn ? m_upload_file.run(() => {showAlert('File successfully uploaded for ' + select_partner_id_for_upload.selectedOptionLabel + ' on ' + select_date_for_upload.formattedDate,'success');}, () => {showAlert('File uploading failed.','error');}) : b_upload_file.run(() => {showAlert('File successfully uploaded for ' + select_partner_id_for_upload.selectedOptionLabel + ' on ' + select_date_for_upload.formattedDate,'success');}, () => {showAlert('File uploading failed.','error');})}}

children.text: {{merge_file_picker.files.length > 0 ? "* Files to be merged: \n" : ""}}{{merge_file_picker.files.map(function(val, index){ return (index+1)+'. ' +val.name}).join(", \n")}}
